thread.section_title: GamerModz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GamerModz | gamermodz.com
thread.title: William Figueroa

author: William Figueroa
title: William Figueroa
text:
Ok ill start off by saying the controller is the best in the industry i have one from from another company and it does not compare to this one everything works perfectly attention to detail is the best ive seen.
Only bad thing that i did not like is the shipping its 6 to 10 buisness days i orderd mine feb27 and got it today march 10th dont get me wrong they never lied about the shipping how long was going to take but i wish they had an option for rush delivery i would certainly would have paid extra if they had an option like that but i also understand they have to make the controler from scratch but overall if you want a modded controller THIS IS THE PLACE TO BUY.
Thank you gamermodz for this amazing controller :)
